title: Pets And Wildlife With Dr. Katy Nelson
teaser: Hound’s Teeth Trouble – Dr. Katy Nelson offers advice to a Virginia woman who has a 9 year old Basset Hound that is biting children.Attitude Adjustment – In San Diego, CA the caretaker of an overly submissive dog is seeks advice on how to modify the canine’s behavior.Music: “Purus River” by Uakti; “The Beatles “Octopus’ Garden
